content: double_crochet 6 chain 3 double_crochet in next st around 60 double_crochet 7 chain 3 *double_crochet in next 4 st 2 double_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * around double_crochet in joining st join with sl st to top of chain 3 72 double_crochet 8-15 ch3 double_crochet in each st around 72 double_crochet fasten_off using photos as guides crochet embellishments separately and sew onto beanie side ridge 1 fold beanie in half join yarn at side edge of round 12 and double_crochet evenly across the surface to center of beanie 3 treble_crochet at center and double_crochet evenly across the surface to opposite edge 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each double_crochet across to opposite edge 3 chain 4 turn treble_crochet in each single_crochet across to opposite edge fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing 4 holding the ridge in place as you go fold the ridge in half and whipstitch the top loops of row 3 to the body of the beanie across sensor worked in rounds without joining 1 chain 2 3 single_crochet in first chain 3 single_crochet 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet 6 single_crochet 3 for rounds 3 and 4 single_crochet in each single_crochet 6 single_crochet fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing sew into place centered over 3dc at top of row 1 of side ridge vent 1 using gold chain 3 11 double_crochet in first chain join with slip_stitch to top of ch3 12 double_crochet 2 chain 3 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet to 24 double_crochet change yarn between gold and gray so that you have 1 gold double_crochet then 3 gray double_crochet 1 gold double_crochet 3 gray double_crochet etc pull yarn along with you rather than cutting for each color change fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing sew to center back of beanie
